commands.title: Start or Join Audio Call
commands.vsls-detail: Enable audio for the Live Share session.

commands.title: Call Settings
commands.vsls-detail: Mute/unmute, select audio devices, or disconnect from the call.

view/title.when: view == liveshare.session.explorer && liveshare:state != Shared && liveshare:state != SharingInProgress && liveshare:state != JoiningInProgress && liveshare:state != Joined

view == liveshare.session && liveshare:state != Shared && liveshare:state != SharingInProgress && liveshare:state != JoiningInProgress && liveshare:state != Joined

view/item/context.when: !liveshare:isWeb && view == liveshare.session.explorer && liveshare:state == Shared && viewItem == servers

!liveshare:isWeb && view == liveshare.session.explorer && liveshare:state == Shared && viewItem == terminals

commandPalette.when: liveshare:isWeb && liveshare:isAudioEnabled && liveshare:audioSessionState == LiveShareWithAudio && liveshare:audioIsMuted == false
